home.title:
Create your own
Casino with Atom
home.description: Atom entered the market to change The Game
home.mainDescription: We are young and creative software company established in 2020. Each of our senior team members have more than 10 years of experience in online gambling and betting industry in different fields: software development, marketing, operations, management etc. We use cutting edge technology to provide seamless, secure and stable solutions for partners seeking to guarantee a quality gaming environment to players. All our products are created on Microservice architecture, therefore infinitely scalable. We can add any new functionality without any downtimes or technical issues. Atom provides AI based tools in compact and minimalist form which makes business of our partners easier, faster and much more economically efficient.

casino and gambling businesses without any setup fees
products.platform.title: Atom Casino Engine
products.platform.description: Atom Casino Engine is a user-friendly management tool. It is an environment from which the casino operator's staff can perform and manage the players’ full activity such as tracking and reporting their gaming history, follow up the financial transactions, manage the partnerships, monitor the statistical data
products.aggregator.title: Atom Game Aggregator
products.aggregator.description: Atom Game Aggregator provides more than 11К multilingual and mobile-friendly games from over 125 leading world famous game merchants in one place. Atom Game Aggregator will give the ability to manage, activate and control the whole game content which will be necessary for players’ satisfaction
